EmailTemplate.description: S3 Survey Link Notification to Case:Contact
EmailTemplate.name: S3 CSAT Survey Email to S3 ContactOLD
EmailTemplate.subject: Did we meet your expectations?
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {!Case.Contact},
Exceeding customer expectations is our goal at Sutter Shared Services. Based on your experiences with Service Request # {!Case.CaseNumber} (opened {!Case.CreatedDate} and resolved {!Case.ClosedDate}), please take a moment to help us evaluate our service by answering four survey questions. We will share your comments with our leadership and make recommendations for changes that will improve your experience with Sutter Health.
The survey can be accessed by clicking the below link.
http://sutterhealth.force.com/SurveyForce/TakeSurvey?id=a0AG000000EpKdtMAF&cId={!Contact.Id}&caId={!Case.Id}
Thank you for your time.
Sutter Health
